name: Don't Worry, I'll Bring The Beer!
name_original: Don't Worry, I'll Bring The Beer!
description:
Info
A short point-and-click adventure made with AGS 3.4.0.16 by tulevik.EU for the LOWREZJAM 2017.

Controls
Mouse:  Left click - move around, interact, use inventory items

                 Right click - put way inventory items

Keyboard:  Move around with Arrow keys
                       ESC - Main menu, close menus
                       F5 -  Save menu
                       F7 -  Load menu
                       F9 -  Restart
                       F10 - Quit
